title: Events
description: Browse upcoming and past running events.

metadata.title: Events | RunGoMX
metadata.description: Find and register for trail running, triathlon, cycling, and other endurance events in Mexico.

capacity.sharedPoolBanner: These distances share a combined pool of {total} total spots

groupDiscount.title: Group discounts
groupDiscount.description: Save up to {percent}% when registering as a group.
groupDiscount.howTo: To use a group discount, register through a group invitation link from the organizer.
groupDiscount.lockNote: Discount is locked when group spots are reserved together.

notFound.title: Event not found
notFound.description: This event may have been removed or is not available yet.

distance.title: Select your distance
distance.description: Choose the distance you want to participate in.

questions.title: Additional questions
questions.description: Please answer the following questions from the event organizer.
questions.skipIfNone: No additional questions for this event.

addons.title: Add-ons
addons.description: Enhance your experience with optional add-ons.
addons.noAddons: No add-ons available for this event.

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: Review the event policies before continuing.
policies.acknowledge: I have read and understand the refund, transfer, and deferral policies for this event.

waiver.title: Waiver agreement
waiver.description: Please read and accept the waiver(s) to continue.
waiver.accept: I have read and agree to the waiver terms
waiver.acceptThis: I have read and agree to the terms of "{title}"

signatureLabels.signature: Type your full name as signature

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Complete your payment to finalize registration.
payment.comingSoon: Online payment coming soon. For now, please contact the organizer to complete your registration.

confirmation.title: Registration complete!
confirmation.nextSteps: You will receive a confirmation email with more details about the event. Check your inbox for further instructions.

alreadyRegistered.title: You're already registered
alreadyRegistered.description: You have an active registration for {distanceName}.
alreadyRegistered.inProgress: Status: {status} - Complete your registration from My Registrations.

errors.registrationClosed: Registration is closed for this event
errors.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered for this event
errors.registrationNotOpen: Registration has not opened yet for this event
errors.activeInviteTitle: You already have an invite reservation
errors.activeInvite: Check your email for the invite link before starting a new registration.

organizerSelfRegistration.title: You're registering for your own event
organizerSelfRegistration.description: This is allowed, but make sure you're signing up with the correct account.

loginRequired.title: Sign in required
loginRequired.description: You need to be signed in to register for this event.

claim.title: Claim your registration
claim.description: Confirm your reserved spot and continue registration.

loginRequired.title: Sign in required
loginRequired.description: You need to be signed in to claim this invite.

CLAIMED.title: Invite already claimed
CLAIMED.description: This invite has already been claimed.

EXPIRED.title: Invite expired
EXPIRED.description: This reservation has expired. Contact the organizer for a new invite.

CANCELLED.title: Invite cancelled
CANCELLED.description: This invite was cancelled by the coordinator.

INVALID.title: Invite invalid
INVALID.description: This invite link is no longer valid.

errors.dobRequired: Please enter your date of birth to claim.
errors.EMAIL_MISMATCH: This invite was sent to a different email address. Sign in with the invited email to claim it.
errors.DOB_MISMATCH: The date of birth doesn't match this invite. Ask the coordinator to resend your invite or contact the organizer.
errors.DOB_REQUIRED: Date of birth is required to claim this invite.
errors.INVITE_INVALID: This invite is no longer active.
errors.INVITE_CANCELLED: This invite was cancelled by the coordinator.
errors.ALREADY_CLAIMED: This invite has already been claimed.
errors.ALREADY_REGISTERED: You already have a registration for this event.
errors.RATE_LIMITED: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
errors.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Please verify your email before claiming.
errors.UNAUTHENTICATED: Please sign in to claim this invite.

groupUpload.title: Group upload
groupUpload.description: Upload a roster and send invite links to participants.

statusHelp.MAXED_OUT: This link has reached its limits.
statusHelp.generic: This link is not currently available.

template.title: Roster template
template.description: Download the CSV template and fill it with participant data.

create.title: Start a new batch
create.description: Select a distance and create a batch to upload your roster.

upload.title: Upload roster
upload.description: Upload a CSV or Excel file to validate all rows.
upload.alreadyUploaded: A roster has already been uploaded for this batch.

reserve.title: Reserve invites
reserve.description: Reserve capacity for valid rows (partial success allowed).

sendInvites.requiresProcessed: Finish reserving all invites before sending. This locks any group discount.

errors.batchNotProcessed: Please reserve all valid rows first. Once the batch is processed, you can send invites.

rows.title: Roster rows
rows.description: Track each participant and manage invite status.

cancelInvite.confirm: Cancel this invite and release the spot?

cancelBatch.confirm: Cancel all unclaimed invites in this batch?

errors.noFile: Please select a file to upload
errors.linkInvalid: This upload link is no longer active.

loginRequired.title: Sign in required
loginRequired.description: You need to be signed in to manage this group upload.

search.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new events.

emptyState.title: No events yet
emptyState.description: There are no published events at the moment. Check back soon!
